firstColumn.title: Rapid development
firstColumn.description: Developer SDK and APIs with abstractions over common data processing patterns; Sandbox mode, programmatic and UI driven debugging; In-memory mode and testing framework to simplify testing; Support for cutting edge Cloud, Apache Hadoop and Apache Spark technologies.

firstColumn.title: Seamless operations
firstColumn.description: REST APIs and CLI for every interaction; Time and process based scheduling; Standardized logs and metrics for all execution environments.

firstColumn.title: Extensible and reusable
firstColumn.description: Templates and blueprints for common use-cases; Hub for sharing pre-built plugins, applications and solutions; Extensible APIs for security, metadata, runtimes and storage.

secondColumn.title: Enterprise ready
secondColumn.description: Metadata repository with automatic technical and operational metadata capture; Business metadata annotations; Data discovery through search based on metadata; Data governance with dataset and field level lineage and auditing; Integration with enterprise security systems.

secondColumn.title: Portable runtime environments
secondColumn.description: Build once, run anywhere through portability across runtime environments such as Kubernetes, Apache Hadoop YARN and Docker.

secondColumn.title: Hybrid and multi cloud
secondColumn.description: Interoperability across on-premises and Cloud environments; Support for all major public cloud providers such as Amazon Web Services, Microsoft Azure and Google Cloud Platform.
